name: ArchE17
short_description:
ArchE17 is a Linux distribution based off Arch Linux equipped with the Liquorix Kernel, Yaourt, and as the name implies, the recently released stable E17 Desktop Environment. 

ArchE17 will be released weekly as a rolling release LiveCD that is designed to run off a standard CD or USB drive, which means the image will always be less than 700MB. 

ArchE17 features a lightweight and fast desktop experience booting up only 104MB (i686) and 135MB (x86_64) of RAM.
summary: ArchE17 is a Linux distribution based off Arch Linux
